text: Carr's Hall was a historic commercial building located at Terre Haute, Vigo County, Indiana. It was built in 1857, and was a two-story, Italianate style brick building. It featured a cast iron storefront on the first story and elaborated pedimented window surrounds on the second. It was one of Terre Haute's oldest buildings. Note: This includes and It has been demolished. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1983. ==References== Category:Commercial buildings on the National Register of Historic Places in Indiana Category:Italianate architecture in Indiana Category:Commercial buildings completed in 1857 Category:Buildings and structures in Terre Haute, Indiana Category:National Register of Historic Places in Terre Haute, Indiana Category:1857 establishments in Indiana
title: Carr's Hall
